description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会湖北省代表。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as a representative of Hubei Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李国璋的家乡和出生地。
description.en: The hometown and birthplace of Li Guozhang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，李国璋的籍贯所在省份。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, and the native province of Li Guozhang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科信息，李国璋是湖北兴山人。
description.en: According to Wikipedia, Li Guozhang is a native of Xingshan, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 李国璋是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Guozhang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，李国璋被选为湖北省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: In 2018, Li Guozhang was elected as a deputy from Hubei Province to the 13th National People's Congress.
